front.title: Configuration Hints for Common Mail User Agents

abstract.t: This informational document describes how certain common Mail UserAgents can be configured for conformance with the IETF Mailing ListGuidelines. Subject to normal processes and procedures, this draftmight some day be published as an Informational RFC.[NOTE: Any comments should be sent to the document editor as email,strongly preferably with a clear Subject: line indicatingthis draft is the topic. Comments with specific proposededits are much more helpful than broad general comments.]
